txt.en: Defeat Vîz and collect his helm
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Vîz has been seen at a fang-shaped rock in the Fallows, and it is believed that his helm will be a valuable part of a collection of bounties.
'Well done, [placeholder]! This trophy will be a lively addition to my ever-growing collection.'

'Hail, [placeholder]! I hear you are quite the foe-hunter in these parts. Perhaps we can work together, eh?

'I am a collector of odds and ends -- trophies of the enemy. I believe that someday they will be of great historical value, you see.

'An Orc named Vîz, a vicious warrior, has evidently been camping out near a fang-shaped rock in the Fallows. Will you bring me his helm? I'll see that you are amply rewarded.'
Vîz can be found camping near a fang-shaped rock in the Fallows, which can be found by following the road south a ways.\n\nYou should summon and defeat Vîz, and collect his helm.
Britric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have collected the helm of Vîz, and should now return to Forlaw to collect your bounty.
